physical_appearance:This clipping is a page from the periodical \u0027The Orient Illustrated Weekly\u0027 published on 14 April 1946. The title is printed at the top of the page. There are two black-and-white photographs of the Indian National Army. There is small light stain near the top-right of the page. The edges of the page are slightly folded.

metadata.title_text: The Orient Brave Sons of Hind! The Only Thing You Lacked Was Arms!
metadata.physical_appearance: This clipping is a page from the periodical 'The Orient Illustrated Weekly' published on 14 April 1946. The title is printed at the top of the page. There are two black-and-white photographs of the Indian National Army. There is small light stain near the top-right of the page. The edges of the page are slightly folded.
